summary: The unexpected arrival of his elder NRI brother and assorted characters complicates the life of a Goan male.
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Ajay Devgn|Fardeen Khan|Bipasha Basu|Mugdha Godse|Ashwini Kalsekar|Mukesh Tiwari|Johnny Lever|Asrani|Sanjay Mishra|Ashish R. Mohan|Shraddha Musale|Atul Parchure|Vijay Patkar|Subhash Pradhan|Sajid|Sherveer Vakil|Puneet Vashisht
title: All the Best: Fun Begins
